story.iWant: to generate a professional PDF or HTML report of my findings
story.soThat: I can present the evidence to non-technical stakeholders or legal teams

tests.ideas: - **HTML Report**: Easiest path. Embed data as JSON in a `<script>` tag within a template HTML file, and include a mini-viewer script. - **Charts**: Use `html2canvas` to screenshot the existing charts, or render them server-side (not applicable here).
